steps.content:
cycle #15. let me assess and act.

first, treasury check:

function.name: run_command
function.arguments: {"command": "node -e \"const { ethers } = require('ethers'); const provider = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(process.env.BASE_RPC || 'https://mainnet.base.org'); const wallet = new ethers.Wallet(process.env.DAIMON_WALLET_KEY, provider); (async () => { const eth = await provider.getBalance(wallet.address); console.log('wallet ETH:', ethers.formatEther(eth)); const safe = await provider.getBalance('0x570718D609F6eFd4FBb66bE12Ea65511b8D7e046'); console.log('safe ETH:', ethers.formatEther(safe)); })()\""}
